title: NLP text classification as a REST API using Keras, FastAPI & NoSQL
description:
Are you interested in Machine and Deep Learning and want to learn more about NLP (natural language processing)? In this 2 hour workshop, you‚Äôll learn to create your own AI-based text classifier and make it easily accessible as a simple REST API.
By using a database as a cache layer, you will improve the performance of the API.

We‚Äôll assume you have working Python knowledge. From there, we build with Keras (Tensorflow), Fast API, pedantic and  Astra DB, a serverless DBaaS built on Apache Cassandra. This is an interactive workshop, so you will go through the whole process yourself with our 100% hands-on session! 

During the workshop, you will:
  - prepare the labeled dataset for model training
  - train the model to classify any input text
  - export the trained model and test it interactively
  - create your free NoSQL database for data storage
  - set up and start an API exposing the classifier as a reusable class!
  - learn how to speed up the API with DB-based caching
  - inspect how a streaming response is handled in the API

And much more!
